## ActionsOption type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ActionsOption<S extends StateOption, G extends GettersOption<S>, M extends MutationsOption<S, G>> = {

        state: StateReturnType<S>;
        getters: GettersReturnType<G>;
```
